constants

Class GameConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • constants.GameConstants

  • public class GameConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all the hard-coded constants used in multiple classes.
    Author:
    Rajit Banerjee, 18202817, Tee Chee Guan, 18202044, Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921 Team 15: DarkMode
